newsitem.title: ZAMBIA: ZAMBIA STOCKS WEEK - ZAMBIA SUGAR LEADS TRADE.
newsitem.headline: ZAMBIA STOCKS WEEK - ZAMBIA SUGAR LEADS TRADE.

text.p: Stock Exchange rose last week, driven by Zambia Sugar which
traded 20,001,323 shares on April 24, exchange officials said.
Zambia Sugar gained 5.25 kwacha to close at 22 kwacha in a
traded volume of 30,923,394 shares worth 739,619,289 kwacha.
"Some analysts believe the Zambia Sugar market valuation
should be around 20 to 25 kwacha but raise the question of how
quickly should the price rise to this level. A sudden jump may
be temporary and not sustainable for any length of time and,
therefore, hurt the market," an exchange official said.

Rothmans fell 5.5 kwacha to end the week at 34 kwacha and
saw 49,970 shares at 1,698,004 kwacha exchanging hands.
